alert.note: Alert for Orange County Coastal; San Diego County Coastal Areas (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Beach Hazards Statement issued July 30 at 9:26PM PDT until August 03 at 5:00PM PDT by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...BEACH HAZARDS STATEMENT REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...For today and Sunday, thunderstorms are possible. For Sunday night through Wednesday, elevated surf of 4 to 7 feet will be likely. * WHERE...San Diego County Coastal Areas and Orange County Coastal Areas. * WHEN...Through Wednesday afternoon. Thunderstorms possible at the beaches tonight and Sunday. * IMPACTS...Dangerous cloud to ground lightning from any thunderstorms. Elevated surf and strong rip currents will create dangerous swimming conditions.
info.instruction: Remain out of the water to avoid hazardous swimming conditions.

area.areaDesc: Orange County Coastal; San Diego County Coastal Areas
